value.title: Travelers to U.K. face long waits amid systems problem
value.excerpt: LONDON >> Travelers arriving in the U.K. faced hourslong delays today after a technical problem shut electronic border gates at airports across the country, forcing everyone to have their passports checked manually on what was expected to be one of the busiest travel weekends of the year.

value.title: Cardiff Beyoncé concert: Face recognition use criticised
value.excerpt: Thousands of fans attending the Beyoncé concert in Cardiff could be scanned by live face recognition cameras deployed in the area by South Wales Police. The cameras will help identify people wanted for "priority offences". Police also used the cameras at the Coronation, but the technology has been criticised by human rights campaigners.
